outputs.output_descr:
The general objective of the project is:
- Strengthen the actions of prevention and control of deforestation in the Legal Amazon implemented by State Governments in conjunction with the Federal Government, and
- Reduce the illegal deforestation in the involved municipalities with the environmental-rural estate registration.
The project has as specific objectives:
- Develop strategies for the prevention and control of deforestation in the States of Mato Grosso, Pará and Acre and improve existing ones, and
- Implement pilot projects of environmental-rural estate registration on selected municipalities, share the information with other data-bases, and, develop the environmental diagnosis of the municipalities.

project_descr: BRA08/003  State Plans for Prevention and Control of Deforestation in the Brazilian Amazon and County Environmental-Rural Estate Registration
project_title: BRA/08/003 State Plans and Env Rural Estate Registration
